attributes.action: Now the BBC is so politically biased to the left, give licence tax payers an opportunity to choose where the money goes.
attributes.additional_details: Union members are to be given an opportunity to send their political levy to somewhere other than the Labour Party.  The TV licence tax is now a political levy by a different name and we licence tax payers should be given an opportunity to direct our money to somewhere other than a grossly left wing taxpayer funded function.
